title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When creating a new file, the line delimiter used is currently based on the value returned by System.getProperties("line.delimiter"). However, this may not always be what the user wants.
EB: The user should be able to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open Eclipse on a Windows workstation. 2. Create a new file. 3. Check the line delimiters used for the new file.
